function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples indicating potential community spread","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection within the community","Mitigation":"Increase surveillance and testing, implement public health measures to reduce transmission","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance, viral detection protocols","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of data on viral shedding in stool over the clinical course of the disease","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately interpreting the significance of viral titers in wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Conduct additional research on viral shedding in stool, gather more clinical data","Technologies":"Clinical research, data collection methods","People":"Research institutions, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on protocol without validation using expensive commercial kits","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate or unreliable detection and quantification of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Validate the protocol using standard commercial kits, ensure the reliability of the detection method","Technologies":"Commercial viral RNA extraction kits, RT-PCR enzyme master mix kits","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratory facilities"}]}
